Handel Pro is a company that values ​​it: Handel Pro is a company that values ​​its customers. Our account managers are doing everything in their power to support you and guide you through the 24/7 trading process, especially if you are a beginner trader. We never abandon our clients and we are always at your disposal.
The Handel Pro platform is easy to use -: The Handel Pro platform is easy to use - it can take you 30 seconds to register an account. In addition, deposits to and withdrawals are very fast and available for both Visa / Mastercard and cryptocurrencies.
A LEADING TRADING PLATFORM IN POLAND: A LEADING TRADING PLATFORM IN POLAND
Monfex is a multinational brand with pro: Monfex is a multinational brand with profound experience in trading on cryptocurrency markets. Monfex Trading Platform, the core product of Monfex, is a powerful, fast and secure online-trading software, which allows traders to buy and sell leveraged cryptocurrency contracts at any time, using any device, and with ultra-low spreads.
Monfex acts not only as a cryptocurrency: Monfex acts not only as a cryptocurrency trading platform, but also as a community of traders and an educational hub, due in part to the Monfex Trading Academy and Monfex Trade Signals.
Allianz Market is a company that values: Allianz Market is a company that values its customers. Our account managers do everything in their power to support you and guide you through the entire trading process 24/7, especially if you are a beginner. The Allianz Market platform is easy to use - account registration it may take you 30 seconds. Besides, account deposits and withdrawals are very fast and available for both Visa / Mastercard and cryptocurrencies.
You can limit the additional funds reser: You can limit the additional funds reserved on your balance by specifying a level of loss that is acceptable to you for this position.

There is no possibility of withdrawing b: There is no possibility of withdrawing bonus. But this is an extra amount on your account and when you make a profit with them, this is something you can withdraw.

Registration from your country is not al: Registration from your country is not allowed
A “bonus” is the money that a company pr: A “bonus” is the money that a company provides to a client for the purposes of trading only under certain conditions. You can view all details on your bonus account. A “bonus” is given to one account per client only.
The amount of “bonus” depends on the amo: The amount of “bonus” depends on the amount of money you deposit. The maximum bonus amount is $500.
What are the rules on the use of bonuses: What are the rules on the use of bonuses?
All the profit a trader makes belongs to: All the profit a trader makes belongs to him/her. It can be withdrawn at any moment and without any further conditions. But note that you cannot withdraw bonus funds themselves: if you submit a withdrawal request, your bonuses are burned.
Example: If a trader deposited $100 in r: Example: If a trader deposited $100 in real funds to the account, and gets a $30 bonus fund, the account balance will be: $100 (own money) + $30 (bonus) = $130. A trader can use $130 for trading by depositing only $100. All the profits a trader makes will belong to him/her.
A “bonus” cannot be lost until there is: A “bonus” cannot be lost until there is a balance on the account.
Can I withdraw my bonus money?: Can I withdraw my bonus money?
Bonuses will be automatically deducted i: Bonuses will be automatically deducted if you apply to make a withdrawal.
The deposit added to your account as a g: The deposit added to your account as a gift.
All profits made are yours to keep.
